document.title: Adding New and Existing Items

xmlkeyword.term: EiffelEnvision, Adding New and Existing Items

document.paragraph:
Adding new project items to EiffelEnvision projects is based heavily on the context that they are added in. Before reading the documentation linked to from this document, you should be aware of how projects are structured and the concepts and notations used in the ../../../../eiffel_for_dotnet/index.xmlEiffel for .NET language.
in_this_section2In This Sectionproject_items.xmlEiffelEnvision Project Item Templates A breakdown of the new project item templates available to add to EiffelEnvision projects. adding_items.xmlAdding New Project Items Explains how to add new project items, from the EiffelEnvision project templates, to the various parts of EiffelEnvision's project. adding_folders.xmlAdding New Folders Explains how to add new folders to the various parts of EiffelEnvision's project hierarchy. adding_existings_items.xmlAdding Existing Items to Projects Explains how to add existing items to EiffelEnvision projects. adding_clusters.xmlAdding Clusters to Projects Explains how to add Eiffel ../../../../../../technologies/dotnet/eiffel_dotnet_language/10_conventions/10_terminology.xmlclusters to EiffelEnvision projects. new_cluster_wizard.xmlNew Cluster Wizard Help on using the New Cluster Wizard, used when adding a cluster to a project. adding_cluster_guidelines.xmlAdding Cluster Guidelines Guidelines to be aware of when adding new ../../../../../../technologies/dotnet/eiffel_dotnet_language/10_conventions/10_terminology.xmlclusters to EiffelEnvision projects. also_see2Related SectionsSee alsoms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfNewProjectDialog.htmNew Project Dialogms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxconvisualstudiosolutionsprojects.htmIntroduction to Solutions, Projects, and Items
